content.rendered: On this Project Jones Construction wanted a new website  that would act as a portfolio and also a portal for their sub-contractors to get information on up coming jobs, and submit bids. Instead of spending a small fortune for a programmer we were able to use wordpress with some great plug-ins to accomplish this. They were looking for a particular front page style so the rest of the site was coded outside of wordpress. Jones Construction will also be running local internet marketing (seo +ppc)
